channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Email Before Download
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Email Before Download

item.title: CVE-2021-24748|2024-08-03T19:42:16.642Z -- unknown -- email%20before%20download
item.description: The Email Before Download WordPress plugin before 6.8 does not properly validate and escape the order and orderby GET parameters before using them in SQL statements, leading to authenticated SQL injection issues
